com.feilong.io

Class MimeTypeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.io.MimeTypeUtil

  • public final class MimeTypeUtil
extends Object
    获取文件Mime-Type.

    MIME(Multi-Purpose Internet Mail Extensions)

    Since:
    1.0.8
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    MimeType, "org.apache.catalina.startup.Tomcat#DEFAULT_MIME_MAPPINGS", "org.apache.http.entity.ContentType", java library to find the mime type from file content, Getting A File Mime Type In Java, MIME Wiki, 也可以使用Apache Tika

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getContentTypeByFileName

        public static String getContentTypeByFileName(String fileName)
        获得 content type by file name.

        Very incomplete function.
        As of Java 7, html, pdf and jpeg extensions 返回 正确的 mime-type,但是js 和 css 返回 null!

        I tried Apache Tika but it is huge with tons of dependencies,
        URLConnection doesn't use the bytes of the files,
        MimetypesFileTypeMap also just looks at files names,and I couldn't move to Java 7.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        the content type by file name
        See Also:
        URLConnection.getFileNameMap(), MimetypesFileTypeMap.getContentType(java.io.File), FileNameMap.getContentTypeFor(String), FilenameUtils.getExtension(String), URLConnection.guessContentTypeFromName(String), URLConnection.guessContentTypeFromStream(java.io.InputStream), "java.nio.file.Files#probeContentType(java.nio.file.Path)"
